616590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Heroic Characters 13 (Token Pack)
616590.description:
Heroic Characters 13

This token pack contains 28 tokens. This pack contains A variety of tokens that can be used as characters or NPCs.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Demon Kin Rogue
  • Female Elf Druid
  • Female Elf Sorceress
  • Female Feral Alchemist
  • Female Gnome Wizard
  • Female Halfling Fighter
  • Female Halfling Wizard
  • Female Xeno
  • Male Angelic Paladin
  • Male Bugman Engineer
  • Male Dwarf Death Seeker
  • Male Dwarf Lord
  • Male Dwarf Paladin
  • Male Dwarf Rogue
  • Male Dwarf Tesla Gunner
  • Male Elf Fighter
  • 2 Male Elf Sword Fighters
  • Male Giant Spartan
  • Male Gnome Wizard
  • Male Half-Elf Ranger
  • Male Half-Elf Rogue
  • 3 Male Kobold Fighters
  • Male Kobold Wizard
  • 2 Male Wood Elf Clerics
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
